p.span: Updates a Context with specified parameters. The context is a 'User Defined' context. If the type is 'average_centered', the fields avg, count, and stdev must be passed in as parameters. If the type is 'domain', the fields count, max and min must be passed in as parameters. See xsCreateUDContext for details about creating a Context using data from a search instead of 'User Defined' data.

xsUpdateUDContext name=string terms="string(,string)*" count=int [class="string(,string)*"] [container=string] [endshape=(curve|linear)] [notes=string] [read=string] [scope=(private|app|global)] [search=string] [shape=(pi|trapezoid|triangle|curveincrease|curvedecrease|linearincrease|lineardecrease)] (type=average_centered avg=double stdev=double | type=domain min=double max=double) [uom=string] [write=string]
xsUpdateUDContext name=ArrDelay terms="early,ontime,late" type=average_centered avg=0 count=10000 stdev=30 uom=minutes
Updates an Average-centered Context, centered at 0, with 3 terms (early, ontime, late) using minutes as the unit of measure (UOM).
| xsUpdateUDContext name=AirTime type=domain terms="minimal,short,medium,long,extended" min=60 max=1400 count=1000 uom=minutes
Updates an Domain Context with the min/max and count specified, the unit of measure is minutes.
avg, count, endshape, max, min, name, shape, stdev, terms, type, uom
The average value of the field.
A comma separated list of classes.
The container to store the context.
The shape of the end concepts. This defaults to curve.
The maximum value of the field.
The minimum value of the field.
A legal string which specifies the name of the Context to update.
A description of the context. This defaults to 'none'.
Read permissions (i.e., roles). This defaults to * (for all roles).
>Where to find the context (private, app, global) to update. This defaults to global.
The search string used to generate data
The shape of the middle concepts. This defaults to pi.
A comma delimited set of legal strings which define the names of the terms within the Context.
The standard deviation of the field values.
average_centered' - centers the context on the average and uses std dev. to scale term sizes
domain - the default, centers the set on (max-min)/2 and scales the context to cover the whole domain
Write permissions (i.e., roles). This defaults to * (for all roles).

The context updated by xsUpdateUDContext is displayed in table or chart format. See xsDisplayContext for details about display of the created Context.
See xsUpdateDDContext for details about updating a Context using a 'streaming' command instead of a 'generating' command.
